name: Stilleto Foxe - Mission: 781
description: This is a short game that I intend to turn into a collection, that was made on Bitsy for an individual project. The game revolves around Stilleto Foxe, a mercenary who has to complete the mission he was assigned to do. But unfortunately, he managed to pass out, and has no recollection of what the mission was. You must explore the area to learn why Stilleto is here, and how to escape.
